org.hbase.async

Class DependentColumnFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hbase.async.ScanFilter
      • org.hbase.async.CompareFilter
        • org.hbase.async.DependentColumnFilter

  • public final class DependentColumnFilter
extends CompareFilter
    Filters key values based on the existence of a dependent, or reference, column. Column values in a row will be filtered unless the row contains a value in the dependent column with the same time stamp.

    A comparison can optionally be provided to further filter based on the value of the dependent column.

    Since:
    1.6
